      • CallBack

        public AgoTime CallBack(CallBack callBack)
        CallBack Pattern

        we use callback to get value from any where possible in PersianDT and this is Asynchronous way to get date and pass it to dev/user can get resonse and deal with it and of course we add Builder Pattern how ? easy we return current object so we can access it after we implement or what ever correct way you are gonna use.

        Parameters:
        callBack - we have too declare callback it how ? easy you can implement the class or use lambda or method refrence of course in java 8 or use Anonymous implement for more you can see examples in Example folder
        Returns:
        a AgoTime object
        See Also:
        AgoTime Example, Current date Example, Current date Example, generate date Example, Genrate Date Example
